籤詩版本二:
Watan ya haskaka sararin sama, gidan ya yi tsit, nan da nan sai gajimare da hazo suka same ni, na fado cikin suma.
Don Allah a yi addu'a don samun kwanciyar hankali, Yunxia Powder, canza sadaka a wannan lokacin, kuma rubuta littafi a cikin gida.
詩意:
A cikin wannan hexagram, gajimare da hazo sun rufe wata.
Ci gaba da bin tsoffin hanyoyin ko da abubuwa ba su yi aiki ba.
籤詩故事一:
◇An kashe shi Wenxiu
A zamanin Jiajing na daular Ming, mayaudaran ministoci ne suka tsara He Wenxiu, kuma iyalinsa sun shiga cikin matsala, Sarauniyar Firayim Minista Lan Ying ta taimaka wa Wenxiu, kuma su biyun sun yi aure a asirce. Shi Wenxiu ya zarge shi da laifin karya Zhang Tang tare da daure shi, daga baya aka kubutar da shi ya zama gwamna bayan ya ci jarrabawa. Wenxiu ya gano inda Wang Lanying yake kuma ya yi ado a matsayin boka don ganowa. Daga karshe an sake haduwa su biyu, kuma an kashe Zhang Tang.
聖意: Ba dadi a gida ina addu'ar kariya, matsalar kudi, matsalar kasuwanci, matsalar aure, rashi Liujia, masu tafiya a kafa, barnar tsutsar ruwa, barnar dabbobi, bacewar jama'a, kararrakin jama'a, hijira, asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya, kabarin dutsen Yan'an ya kamata. a gyara
